TopicTitle: framework item: Droplist for right click menu

Articles.Content: we have labels (lack of controls hah), buttons, scrollbars, bars that fill, but no sign of droplists!
You are going to have to be more specific if you want any traction on this.

It's a common GUI element, like so:

[IMG]https://i-msdn.sec.s-msft.com/dynimg/IC725266.png[/IMG]

Not overly useful for stock (until a stock fuel switch arrives?), but I can see it being useful for some mods.

ROFL, I know what it is, I'm a .NET GUI programmer, but more specifics are needed about why the OP wants it. You can easily replicate it's functionality with what we have. Any of the texture switching mods can be used as an example. Tweakable menus and Drop Down Lists are already both context menus and having a context menu spawn from a context menu is going to make things difficult, especially since Squad hasn't figured out how to make the menus [URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/119561-1-0-2-Menu-Stabilizer"]stay still in flight[/URL] yet. In general I'm going to say it's a bad idea and I don't want to see my favorite mods attempting misguided implementations of this, so I'd rather not see it at all.

menu stabilizer mod, made forever ago
